attributes.action: Use the ever increasing cost of the "road fund license" to service, and repair the roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have come to notice the roads around the UK are falling into a state of serious disrepair.
Would it be to much to ask the government to invest the ever increasing "road tax" back into the roads, instead of using it to pay off there debts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
